languages.text: Нечестивые аугментации, внедренные в тело Паскаля, были беспощадно вырваны. Пусть тело пострадало, но дух и верность Омниссии укрепились и пребудут в чистоте. От этой травмы нельзя избавиться обычными способами
The unholy augmetics were mercilessly removed from Pasqal's body. His body might be damaged but his spirit and devotion to the Omnissiah are strong and pure. Cannot be removed by regular means
languages.original_text: Нечестивые аугментации, внедренные в тело Паскаля, были беспощадно вырваны. Пусть тело пострадало, но дух и верность Омниссии укрепились и пребудут в чистоте. От этой травмы нельзя избавиться обычными способами

traits.locale_text: The unholy augments were mercilessly removed from the Pasqal's body. His body might be damaged but his spirit and devotion to the Omnissiah are strong and pure.

The unholy augmetics were mercilessly removed from Pasqal's body. His body might be damaged but his spirit and devotion to the Omnissiah are strong and pure. Cannot be removed by regular means

languages.text: 穢れたオーグメティックは容赦なくパスカルの体から取り除かれた。彼の肉体は傷ついているかもしれないが、彼の精神と万機神への献身は強く純粋だ。 通常の方法では除去できない
languages.original_text: The unholy augmetics were mercilessly removed from Pasqal's body. His body might be damaged but his spirit and devotion to the Omnissiah are strong and pure. Cannot be removed by regular means

traits.locale_text: 穢れたオーグメティックは容赦なくパスカルの体から取り除かれた。彼の肉体は傷ついているかもしれないが、彼の精神と万機神への献身は強く純粋だ。 通常の方法では除去できない

languages.text: 邪恶的植入物已经从帕斯卡的身体中被无情地移除。或许他的肉体确实受了伤，但他对欧姆尼塞亚的信念无比强大，无比纯洁。 此效果无法通过通常手段移除
languages.original_text: The unholy augmetics were mercilessly removed from Pasqal's body. His body might be damaged but his spirit and devotion to the Omnissiah are strong and pure. Cannot be removed by regular means

traits.locale_text: 邪恶的植入物已经从帕斯卡的身体中被无情地移除。或许他的肉体确实受了伤，但他对欧姆尼塞亚的信念无比强大，无比纯洁。

languages.text: Los auméticos impíos fueron extirpados sin piedad del cuerpo de Pasqal. Su cuerpo puede estar dañado, pero su espíritu y su devoción al Omnissiah son fuertes y puros. No se puede curar por medios normales
languages.original_text: The unholy augmetics were mercilessly removed from Pasqal's body. His body might be damaged but his spirit and devotion to the Omnissiah are strong and pure. Cannot be removed by regular means

traits.locale_text: Los auméticos impíos fueron extirpados sin piedad del cuerpo de Pasqal. Su cuerpo puede estar dañado, pero su espíritu y su devoción al Omnissiah son fuertes y puros.

languages.text: Die unheiligen Augmentationen wurden gnadenlos aus Pasqals Körper entfernt. Sein Körper mag beschädigt sein, doch sein Geist und seine Hingabe dem Omnissiah gegenüber sind stark und rein. Kann mit normalen Mitteln nicht entfernt werden.
languages.original_text: The unholy augmetics were mercilessly removed from Pasqal's body. His body might be damaged but his spirit and devotion to the Omnissiah are strong and pure. Cannot be removed by regular means

traits.locale_text: Die unheiligen Augmentationen wurden gnadenlos aus Pasqals Körper entfernt. Sein Körper mag beschädigt sein, doch sein Geist und seine Hingabe dem Omnissiah gegenüber sind stark und rein.

languages.text: Les augmétiques impies ont été brutalement retirés du corps de Pasqal. Bien que son enveloppe soit endommagée, sa détermination et sa dévotion envers l'Omnimessie demeurent inébranlables. Impossible à supprimer par des méthodes ordinaires.
languages.original_text: The unholy augmetics were mercilessly removed from Pasqal's body. His body might be damaged but his spirit and devotion to the Omnissiah are strong and pure. Cannot be removed by regular means

traits.locale_text: Les augmétiques impies ont été brutalement retirés du corps de Pasqal. Bien que son enveloppe soit endommagée, sa détermination et sa dévotion envers l'Omnimessie demeurent inébranlables.

languages.text: Uğursuz ogmetikler, Pasqal'ın bedeninden acımasızca çıkarıldı. Bedeni hasar almış olsa da ruhu ve Hermesih'e olan bağlılığı, kuvvetini ve saflığını koruyor.
languages.original_text: The unholy augmetics were mercilessly removed from Pasqal's body. His body might be damaged but his spirit and devotion to the Omnissiah are strong and pure. Cannot be removed by regular means

traits.locale_text: Uğursuz ogmetikler, Pasqal'ın bedeninden acımasızca çıkarıldı. Bedeni hasar almış olsa da ruhu ve Hermesih'e olan bağlılığı güçlü ve saf durumda.

languages.text: The unholy augmetics were mercilessly removed from Pasqal's body. His body might be damaged but his spirit and devotion to the Omnissiah are strong and pure. Can't be removed by normal means.
